data.text: Article 19. Identification of Novel Autoantibodies in Type 1 Diabetic Patients Using a High-Density Protein Microarray Article Serum bilirubin levels are positively associated with glycemic variability in women with type 2 diabetes Article Autophagy deficiency in β cells blunts incretin-induced suppression of glucagon release from α cells Article Improved insulin secretion by autologous islet transplantation, compared to oral anti-diabetic agents, after distal pancreatectomy Article The Potential of Endothelial Colony-Forming Cells to Improve Early Graft Loss after Intraportal Islet Transplantation Article Clinical Characteristics of the Responders to DPP-4 Inhibitors in Korean Subjects with Type 2 Diabetes Article Evaluation of 1,5-anhydroglucitol as a marker for glycemic variability in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus Article Life-threatening hypoglycemia induced by a tyrosine kinase inhibitor in a patient with neuroendocrine tumor: A case report. Article Magnetosome-like ferrimagnetic iron oxide nanocubes for highly sensitive MRI of single cells and transplanted pancreatic islets. Article Improved glycemic control without hypoglycemia in elderly diabetic patients using the ubiquitous healthcare service, a new medical information system. Article Assessment of glycemic lability and severity of hypoglycemia in Korean patients with type 1 diabetes. Article Role of autophagy in β-cell function and mass. Article Analysis of hemodialysis-associated hypoglycemia in patients with type 2 diabetes using a continuous glucose monitoring system. Article Polymyxin B, scavenger of endotoxin, enhances isolation yield and in vivo function of islets. Article Role of Autophagy in Diabetes and Mitochondria Announcements Annals of the New York Academy of Sciences Date of publication 2010. 7 Article Delayed improvement of insulin secretion after autologous islet transplantation in partially pancreatectomized patients. Co-researcher Seong-Ho Choi, Sung-Joo Kim, Dong-Wook Cho, Jin-Seok Heo, Kyu Taek Lee, Jong Kyun Lee, Kee-Taek Jang, Byung-Wan Lee, Jae-Hwan Jee, Jung-Hyun Noh, In Kyung Jeong, Tae-Young Yang, Seung-Hoon Oh, You-Ran Ahn, Young-Seok Kim, Heesung No, Moon-Kyu Lee, and Kwang-Won Kim. Article Enhancement of beta cell regeneration by islet transplantation after partial pancreatectomy in mice. Co-researcher You-Ran Ahn,* Seung-Hoon Oh, Young-Seok Kim, Heesung No, Moon-Kyu Lee, and Kwang-Won Kim Article Loss of Autophagy Diminishes Pancreatic Beta-Cell Mass and Function with Resultant Hyperglycemia.
